name: The Death of Big Bad Wolf
name_original: The Death of Big Bad Wolf
description:
A short Twine game based on the Three Little Pigs fairy tale. 

You play as a detective investigating three seemingly unrelated cases. Talk to witnesses, explore the crime scenes, and interrogate suspects to discover what has happened.  Only you can decide who is innocent and who is guilty.

If you enjoyed this game and would like me to write for any of your projects, please check out my work at https://www.marksportfolio.co.uk/
